price: 39. Calaamooyinka Alle waxaa ka mid ah  inaad aragto dhulka oo bas (abaar) ah, markase aan ku soo da’inno biyo (roob) uu noolaado oo soo kor noqdo. Hubaal Kan (Allaah ee) nooleeya wuxuu nooleyn maytida. Hubaal wax walba wuu Karaa.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَنَّكَ تَرَى ٱلۡأَرۡضَ خَٰشِعَةٗ فَإِذَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهَا ٱلۡمَآءَ ٱهۡتَزَّتۡ وَرَبَتۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡيَاهَا لَمُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi annaka tarā al-arḍa khāshiʿatan fa-idhā anzalnā ʿalayhā al-māa ih'tazzat warabat inna alladhī aḥyāhā lamuḥ'yī al-mawtā innahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
